Three students (including Angel Mao Ying) are expelled from Korea and move back to China to start up a martial-arts school in Hapikdo, but like in Bruce LeeÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Fists Of Fury, a rival Japanese martial-arts club will do all they can to crush any competing club that opens in their area.
